text:
ti&m | Switzerland, Zurich | Frontend, Backend, Java, .NET, Angular, mobile | Full-time

Salary is 7.500 - 10.000 CHF per month after taxes (yes after taxes...). You have to be eligible to work in Switzerland, though. If you are an EU citizen, you're fine.

We built the biggest payment app in Switzerland (paymit) and we are always looking for people who want to work on challenging projects. Currently, we are hiring for many roles. Just check out our homepage:

https://www.ti8m.ch/en/career

Write a mail with some code sample or with a very short description of what you've built that you're most proud of to:

ti8m@gmx.ch

If you are unsure, if Zurich is for you, read this blogpost: https://medium.com/@iwaninzurich/eight-reasons-why-i-moved-t...
